creator: pvdw@cendec.com
text:
This works fine
        <exec dir="./../../AppResChange/" executable="test.sh" os="Linux">
          <arg line="${client}"/>
        </exec>
changing the name to AAXX.sh or any other name fails.
resulting in a error saying
that AAX.sh cannot be found

Yes I do have a AAXX.sh with the correct chmod/chown etc

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Where is the AAX.sh file. Is it on the path? If not you will need to give its
full path in the executable attribute.

You need to set vmlauncher to false (a quirk in JDK 1.3 and above).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3129 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
